attributes.action: Leveson Enquiry means Control of The Media
attributes.additional_details:
The real Leveson Inquiry agenda is political control of the free press and media in Britain.

Ask yourself; whose interest do these people serve and whose secrets do these people protect?

How else would we have got to know about Government Scandals and Cover-ups etc than with a Free Press?
 How did the alleged actions of Jimmy Saville become known to you and do you want that sort of thing covered up? Well you dont have a Free Press that is controlled by anyone, least of all Governments and Private Committees.
